span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 违背，犯错： to fail to keep; to commit an offense
【例】 don't even think about transgressing the drug laws of that Asian country, for punishments are severe and there's nothing that our government can do to intervene 别指望违背亚洲国家的药品相关法，因为惩罚非常严厉，政府会尽全力干涉
【近】 breach, break, contravene, fracture, infringe, offend, traduce
【反】 follow, mind, obey, observe, comply with, conform to 遵守

【记】 trans 穿越，越过 + gress go 走；progress 进步，向前走
【另】 aggress 向前走→进攻，congress(走到一起)聚会,degressive(下走)下降，digress(分开走)离题
，ingress(向里走)入口，egress(向外走)出口，progress (前走)前进，regress (回走)退回，retrogress (回走)退步，transgress (穿过走)越界
